casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. James T. Stone (6565)

Daly, Stoughton and O’Connell, Js.

Argued June 16— decision released June 24, 1988 Richard W. Gifford, with whom was Paul B. Groobert, for the appellant (defendant). Leon F. Dalbec, Jr., deputy assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, was T.R. Paulding, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

There is no error.
